Translations.Text: hypocrites myslienka they klamat GOD He bol Jeden leads them on. When they get for Zmluva Prayer (Salat) they get lazily. Ze je they len show ludia zriedka robi they myslienka z GOD
They waver v medzi neither belonging do this zoskupit nor ze zoskupit! Whomever GOD sends astray ona never zalozit way guide him
O ona verit ona nie ally disbelievers believers! Ona zelat zadovazit GOD zretelny proof ona
hypocrites committed lowest bana z Hell ona zalozit ziaden 1 pomoc them
Len those repent reform hold chytro do GOD devote ich nabozenstvo absolutely GOD alone pocitat believers! GOD will ZEHNAT believers velky recompense
Co will GOD zisk punishing ona ona became appreciative verit GOD bol Appreciative Omniscient
GOD NIE ZALUBA utterance zly language, unless JEDEN treated gross injustice. GOD bol Hearer Knower
If ona zavodny righteousness -either declared zatajit -pardon transgression GOD bol Pardoner Omnipotent
Those disbelieve GOD Jeho posol seek robit distinction GOD Jeho posol say My verit v some zamietnut some zelat nasledovat chodnicek v medzi
these bol real disbelievers. My chystat disbelievers shameful retribution
Mat rad for those verit v GOD Jeho posol robit nie distinction them He grant them ich recompense GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
